Pre-Game Insights: Bookmakers list the Astros as -168 favorites on the moneyline, while giving the underdog Angels +140 moneyline odds to win.
The total for the matchup is set at 8.5 runs.
Astros Recent Betting Performance: The Astros went 5-5 over the 10 games they were favored on the moneyline in their last 10 matchups.
Over their last 10 matchups -- all had a set run total -- the Astros and their opponents combined to hit the over on the total six times.
Angels Recent Betting Performance: The Angels have played as underdogs in 10 of their past 10 games and have gone 3-7 in those contests.
The Angels and their opponents have combined to hit the over five times in their last 10 games with a total.
Astros Player Insights: Yordan Alvarez is the bat to watch in the Astros lineup, leading the team in batting average (.310), home runs (34), and RBI (84).
Jose Altuve is hitting.303 with 28 doubles, 19 home runs and 44 walks.
Angels Player Insights: Neto paces the Angels with 71 runs batted in while racking up a team-high batting average of.253.
Taylor Ward has put up a team-best 23 home runs.
